alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 11 at 8:17PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity for the following rivers in South Dakota... North Fork Yellow Medicine River near Milbank affecting Grant County. .The following river forecasts include forecast precipitation through the next 24 hours. Any additional future precipitation could affect the forecasts. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring. * WHERE...North Fork Yellow Medicine River near Milbank. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1045.0 feet, Major agricultural flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 1045.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday was 1045.1 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1041.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Thursday morning by 515 AM CDT.
